languages.text: "И правда, кругом сплошные болваны, оставлять эту старую посудину на них — вопиющая безответственность. Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, епитимья будет исполнена".
"You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."
languages.original_text: "И правда, кругом сплошные болваны, оставлять эту старую посудину на них — вопиющая безответственность. Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, епитимья будет исполнена".

traits.locale_text: "You are not wrong, leaving this old boat to these fools would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Captain, I will do my penance."
"You are not wrong, leaving this old boat to these fools would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Captain, I will do my penance."
"You are not wrong. Leaving this old boat with these fools would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Captain. I shall undergo my penance."
"You are not wrong. Leaving this old boat with these fools would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Captain. I shall undergo my penance."
"You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."
"You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

languages.text: «No se equivoca. Dejarle esta bañera a estos mentecatos sería muy irresponsable. Gracias, Lord Capitán. Me ocuparé de mi castigo».
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

traits.locale_text: «No se equivoca. Dejarle esta bañera a estos mentecatos sería muy irresponsable. Gracias, Lord Capitán. Me ocuparé de mi castigo».

languages.text: 「あなたは間違っていません。この古い船を奴らに預けるなんて、どう見ても無責任です。ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。自分の懺悔と向き合います」
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは間違っていません。この古い船を奴らに預けるなんて、どう見ても無責任です。ありがとうございます、ロード・キャプテン。自分の懺悔と向き合います」

languages.text: “你说得没错，要是把这个破铁桶留给那群白痴，那恐怕是太不负责任了。谢谢你，船长老大，我一定会好好自行惩戒。”
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，要是把这个破铁桶留给那群白痴，那恐怕是太不负责任了。谢谢你，船长老大，我一定会好好自行惩戒。”

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr nicht unrecht. Die alte Nussschale diesen Idioten zu überlassen, wäre nachgerade unverantwortlich. Danke, Lord Cap'n. Ich kümmere mich um meine Bestrafung."
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr nicht unrecht. Die alte Nussschale diesen Idioten zu überlassen, wäre nachgerade unverantwortlich. Danke, Lord Cap'n. Ich kümmere mich um meine Bestrafung."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Il serait complètement irresponsable de laisser ce vieux rafiot entre les mains de ces incapables. Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je veillerai à faire pénitence. »
languages.original_text: "You aren't wrong. Leaving this old tub with these idiots would be blatantly irresponsible. Thank you, Lord Cap'n. I'll see to my penance."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Il serait complètement irresponsable de laisser ce vieux rafiot entre les mains de ces incapables. Merci, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je veillerai à faire pénitence. »
